WorkExperience.Activities: <ul><li><strong>Development of Test Framework</strong><ul><li>Set up test systems comprised of host machines and embedded devices (DUT)</li><li>Developed software for test execution over serial communication in Python and Shell scripting</li><li>Worked on deployment of automation system to end-to-end build flow for software validation on embedded devices</li></ul></li><li><strong>Construction of Test Hardware</strong><ul><li>Interfaced test subjects with appropriate test tools</li><li>Diagnosed and fixed hardware set-up issues</li><li>Designed and constructed hardware extensions from electronic components for a test automation framework and enhanced test capabilities of the framework</li></ul></li><li><strong>Test Content Creation</strong><ul><li>Interpreted requirements and devised strategies for test coverage to validate products against requirements</li><li>Developed test scripts based on test steps</li></ul></li><li><strong>Test Analyst</strong><ul><li>Supervised executions of test cycles</li><li>Analysed test reports and worked with counterparts for issue updates</li><li>Provided test-related technical support during cross-team collaboration</li></ul></li></ul>

<p>Conducted various research work at Plasma Research Laboratory:</p><ul><li>Constructed a high voltage pulse circuit</li><li>Designed extension parts with SolidWorks</li><li>Simulated the flow of a plasma gasification process with software</li></ul>
<p>Received and inspected faulty devices from customers. Provided advice and solutions after performing diagnosis. Handled customers&#39; requests for repairing their devices by ASUS engineers.</p>
